statements: DELETE FROM pro_shop_inventory WHERE id = 101 AND category = 'electronics';
DELETE FROM pro_shop_inventory WHERE price >= 100 AND inventory_count < 50;
DELETE FROM pro_shop_inventory WHERE quantity_in_stock < restock_level AND product_name IN ('ProductA', 'ProductB');
DELETE FROM sales_tracking WHERE total_price > 1000 AND quantity_sold < 5;
DELETE FROM restocking WHERE restock_date < '2021-01-01' AND quantity_restocked > 20;
DELETE FROM Sales WHERE price > 1000 AND sale_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Restocking WHERE quantity < 10 AND restock_date < CURRENT_DATE;
DELETE FROM product WHERE category = 'Sports Equipment';
